title: Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate AIO 11in1 ESD pt-BR May 2015
description:
* Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate AIO 11in1 ESD pt-BR May 2015


 [ RELEASE INFO ]


 * File: Win7.AIO.ESD.pt-BR.May2015.iso

 * Source: n/a
 * Size: 4,95GB
 * Format: Bootable ISO

 * CRC32: 3b567932
 * MD5:	84eacadfe07056099c0c154267980595
 * SHA-1: 4e3ec4f72f7fd4aaa79ad94daca1163934a0db00

 * Language: pt-BR  [ Portuguese - BR ]

 [ CONTENTS ]

 * Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

 * Internet Explorer 11
 * .NET Framework 4.5.2 (KB3035805)
 * Security & important Updates - 2015-05-12

 * Setupcomplete / Post-install:
 
 * KB890830
 * Defender Updates

 [ FEATURES ]

 * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
 * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
 
 [ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

 * 32bit:
 * Windows 7 Starter
 * Windows 7 Home Basic
 * Windows 7 Home Premium 	         
 * Windows 7 Professional
 * Windows 7 Enterprise		
 * Windows 7 Ultimate			

 * 64bit:
 * Windows 7 Home Basic
 * Windows 7 Home Premium 	         
 * Windows 7 Professional		
 * Windows 7 Enterprise		
 * Windows 7 Ultimate

 [ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

 * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

 * All OPTIONAL applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers **

 * that will install the latest available version for you.

 * Web installers requires connection to internet.

 * To activate Enterprise, select "Enterprise Only".

 * For all other editions, select "Daz Loader".

 * Choose any optional application(s).

 * Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.

 * To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".

 * Activators: Daz Loader v2.2.2.0 & KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition.

 * Both Activators Potential False Positive Virus Alarm

 [ Optional software ]

 * Google Chrome
 * Mozilla Firefox
 * Opera Chromium
 * 7-zip 9.30
 * Adobe Reader
 * DirectX
 * Flashplayer
 * Java JRE
 * Malwarebytes
 * MSE
 * Notepad++
 * WinRAR 5.21
 * GOM Player
 * VLC Player
 * Winamp

 [ ** Web installers https://ninite.com/ ]

 [ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

 * NOTE! A boot.wim from Win 8 is used to get Win7 to work with ESD format.
 
 * This makes setup resemble Win 8, but it is 100% Win7.

 * No upgrades, only clean installs.

 * Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus, 

 * (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

 * Credits: 
 * milrob and stevie-boy for continued support and help with user questions.


 * Hope you will enjoy this release![/b]

 * Regards,
 * Generation2 @ KAT & TPB
